file.name: valid_schema_types.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.1

# this example shows that top-level schemaObjects MAY be booleans

info:
  title: API
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  schemas:
    anything_boolean: true
    nothing_boolean: false
    anything_object: {}
    nothing_object: { not: {} }

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!bool `true` into ogen.Schema; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!bool `false` into ogen.Schema
